languages.text: "Видела, как гниет лицо леди Ноэллы? Никакими белилами такое не исправить. Говорят, бедняжка пыталась замазать язвы побелкой для стен…"
"Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."
languages.original_text: "Видела, как гниет лицо леди Ноэллы? Никакими белилами такое не исправить. Говорят, бедняжка пыталась замазать язвы побелкой для стен…"

traits.locale_text: "Did you see Noella's rotting face? No amount of face whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has tried covering her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."
"Did you see Noella's rotting face? No amount of face whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has tried covering her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

"Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

languages.text: 「レディ・ノエラのただれた顔、見た？どんなに美白剤を使っても、どうにもならないって。可哀そうに。顔のただれを隠すために、石灰塗料を塗ってるんですって。あの壁に使うもので…」
languages.original_text: "Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

traits.locale_text: 「レディ・ノエラのただれた顔、見た？どんなに美白剤を使っても、どうにもならないって。可哀そうに。顔のただれを隠すために、石灰塗料を塗ってるんですって。あの壁に使うもので…」

languages.text: "Leydi Noella'nın yüzünü gördün mü? Beyazlatıcıyı boca etsen de düzelmez o surat. Zavallıcık, yaralarını kireç sütüyle kapatmaya çalışmış. Duvarlara kullandıkları var ya..."
languages.original_text: "Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

traits.locale_text: "Leydi Noella'nın yüzünü gördün mü? Beyazlatıcıyı boca etsen de düzelmez o surat. Zavallıcığın, yaralarını kireç sütüyle kapatmaya çalıştığını söylüyorlar. Duvarlara kullandıkları var ya..."

languages.text: «¿Has visto la cara putrefacta de lady Noella? Ningún blanqueador puede arreglar eso. Dicen que la pobre criatura ha intentado cubrir sus pústulas con cal. La misma que usan para las paredes...».
languages.original_text: "Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

traits.locale_text: «¿Has visto la cara putrefacta de lady Noella? Ningún blanqueador puede arreglar eso. Dicen que la pobre criatura ha intentado cubrir sus pústulas con cal. La misma que usan para las paredes...».

languages.text: “诺艾拉夫人的脸都烂了，你们看到了吗？烂成那个样子，再怎么扑粉也盖不住。大家都说，那个可怜的家伙一直往脸上刷石灰水掩饰，就是刷墙的那种石灰……”
languages.original_text: "Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

traits.locale_text: “诺艾拉夫人的脸都烂了，你们看到了吗？烂成那个样子，再怎么扑粉也盖不住。大家都说，那个可怜的家伙一直往脸上刷石灰水掩饰，就是刷墙的那种石灰……”

languages.text: « Vous avez vu le visage en décomposition de dame Noella ? La céruse à elle seule serait bien incapable d'y remédier. Le bruit court qu'elle aurait tenté de dissimuler ses lésions avec de la chaux, la pauvre. Comme celle qu'on utilise pour blanchir les murs... »
languages.original_text: "Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez vu le visage en décomposition de dame Noella ? La céruse à elle seule serait bien incapable d'y remédier. Le bruit court qu'elle aurait tenté de dissimuler ses lésions avec de la chaux, la pauvre. Comme celle qu'on utilise pour blanchir les murs... »

languages.text: "Habt Ihr Lady Noellas verfaultes Gesicht gesehen? Da ist auch mit Bleichmittel nichts mehr zu machen. Es heißt, die arme Seele wollte ihre Pusteln mit Kalkmilch überdecken. Damit streicht man normalerweise Wände ..."
languages.original_text: "Did you see Lady Noella's rotting face? No amount of whitener can fix that. They say the poor soul has been trying to cover her sores with limewash. The kind they use for walls..."

traits.locale_text: "Habt Ihr Lady Noellas verfaultes Gesicht gesehen? Da ist auch mit Bleichmittel nichts mehr zu machen. Es heißt, die arme Seele wollte ihre Pusteln mit Kalkmilch überdecken. Damit streicht man normalerweise Wände ..."
